trans-unit.resname: PPLC·161★ | Oros, the Avenger | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Oros, the Avenger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, Oros deals 3 damage to each nonwhite creature.
Hedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {W}: Regenerate Hedge Troll.
His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.
